Package Engine

Class Camera

java.lang.Object
Engine.Camera
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Game camera with a transform that specifies position, rotation and area viewed by the camera.
Author:
Pere
